0.text: Innate: Zilean generates  2 / 3.5 / 5 / 6 / 12 (based on level) experience (does not count towards his own level up) every 5 seconds. Time in a Bottle is on cooldown when the game starts and becomes disabled when Zilean reaches level 18.

1.text: When he has enough to level up an allied  champion, he can select them to begin a 1.2 second  channel that starts after a 0.5-second cast time. This will be  interrupted and disabled upon entering combat with enemy  champions and  turrets, placing it on a  10 second cooldown, reduced to 1 second if Zilean interrupted it himself.

2.text: A successful channel levels up the target and rewards Zilean the same amount of  experience for himself as well.

0.text: Active: Zilean throws a ticking time bomb to the target location that grants  sight of its surroundings. The bomb will attach itself to units that move within the epicenter, or those hit directly,  revealing them.

1.text: After 3 seconds, or when the attached unit dies, the bomb explodes to deal magic damage to nearby enemies.

2.text: The bomb detonates immediately if another bomb attaches itself to the same unit,  stunning nearby enemies for a duration.

0.text: Active: Zilean  reduces the cooldowns of  Time Bomb and  Time Warp by 10 seconds each.
Active: Zilean applies Time Warp to the target champion which lasts for 2.5 seconds.

1.text: Time Warp: If the target is an ally, they gain  bonus movement speed. If the target is an enemy, they are  slowed.

0.text: Active: Zilean places a protective time rune on the target allied  champion or himself for 5 seconds.

1.text: If the target takes  fatal damage within the duration, they enter  resurrection for 3 seconds, becoming  invulnerable,  untargetable, and  unable to act. Afterwards, they revive while being  healed.

+12 summoner spell haste

1.originHTML: +  650

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

  • trinket

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8 ability power
+10 health
+50% base mana regeneration
+ 2 per 10 seconds

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Tribute: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants 20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Frostfang, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TRIBUTE: Grants a charge every 10 seconds, up to 3 charges. If an allied champion is nearby, damaging abilities and attacks against champions and structures consume a charge, up to one per attack or cast. Consuming a charge grants  20. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • Support
  • Economy
  • Gold

consume.originHTML:
Consume

Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.
consume.originText: Regenerates 5 health every 0.5 seconds over 15 seconds, restoring a total of 150 health.

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • red

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+40 ability power
+20 ability haste
+200 health
+100% base mana regeneration

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Inspire: Grants you and all allies within 1000 units of you 30% bonus movement speed for 4 seconds (75 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – INSPIRE: Grants you and all allies within 1000 units of you 30% bonus movement speed for 4 seconds (75 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Motivate: Healing, shielding, or buffing allied champions (excluding yourself) grants you and them 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds (4 (per champion) second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – MOTIVATE:  Healing,  shielding, or buffing allied champions (excluding yourself) grants you and them 25% bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds (4 (per champion) second cooldown).

1.originHTML: +  +  750

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • shurelya
  • reverie

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 ability power
+20 ability haste
+100% base mana regeneration

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Puffcap Toxin: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 25% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds. Healing or shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) empowers your and their next instance of damage against enemy champions within 5 seconds to apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – PUFFCAP TOXIN: Dealing magic damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 25%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.  Healing or  shielding allied champions (excluding yourself) empowers your and their next instance of damage against enemy champions within 5 seconds to apply 40%  Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+65 ability power
+10 ability haste
+45 armor

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Stasis: Put yourself in stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you untargetable and invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – STASIS: Put yourself in  stasis for 2.5 seconds, rendering you  untargetable and  invulnerable for the duration but also unable to move, declare basic attacks, cast abilities, use summoner spells, or activate items (120 second cooldown).

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 ability power
+200 health
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.

Keywords

  • aa

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+65 ability power
+30 ability haste
+200 health
+5% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spelldance: After dealing 3 instances of damage from basic attacks or ability damage to champions within 3 seconds, gain 15% bonus movement speed, decaying to 5% over 2 seconds, and 40 ability power for 5 seconds, refreshing on damage dealt to champions though not resetting the effect.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPELLDANCE: After dealing 3 instances of damage from basic attacks or ability damage to champions within 3 seconds, gain 15% bonus movement speed, decaying to 5% over 2 seconds, and 40 ability power for 5 seconds, refreshing on damage dealt to champions though not resetting the effect.

If the target takes  fatal damage within the duration, they enter  resurrection for 3 seconds, becoming  invulnerable,  untargetable, and  unable to act. Afterwards, they revive while being  healed.
After 3 seconds, or when the attached unit dies, the bomb explodes to deal magic damage to nearby enemies.
